title: Ashe Sound Effects
body:
Not a major issue, but every game I've played since the last update, that has had an Ashe in it, I can hear her sound effects all across the map. For example, I can hear her fire her volley in bot lane very clearly, even if I'm in top or mid lane, as if I'm right there with her in bot lane. Doesn't occur with any other champ.

Weird.

replies.body: I've had the opposite. When I've played Ashe, quite a few times i'll send off a W Volley, and no sound would accompany it...
Maybe your sound effects ended up in my game haha? :P
